q: it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Carmelo Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said. "You win games with stops more than making shots. I thought Kenyon Martin was the star of the game." JR Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a

states that host early presidential primary contests, fueling some speculation he might seek the White House instead. Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., announced Thursday that he would not run for president in 2012. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012."
